title: Inflation exceeds nominal i, real i is negative

content.question: Which of the following is true about the expected real interest rate?

choices.label: It is equal to the nominal interest rate plus the expected inflation rate.
It is equal to the ratio of the nominal interest rate to the inflation rate.
It increases as the price level increases.
It is negative if the expected inflation rate exceeds the nominal interest rate.

content.answer: It is negative if the expected inflation rate exceeds the nominal interest rate.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
